Articles.Content:
Hey guys.

I keep seeing some sort of small interface in pictures that looks a bit like a cheat console. I think it might do something like make parts indestructible or change orbits.

Any info is greatly appreciated.
Is it the ctrl-alt-shift-d (Debug) interface or the MechJeb interface?
What you're seeing are plugins, like MechJeb.

@Elmach. Thanks very much.

But I also saw a shot where somebody was imputting orbit cords into areas, and in the next shot, he'd gone into an orbit around somewhere.

Edited October 13, 2012 by Milo Kurtiss
Well We don't have the orbit thing but we do have infinite fuel rcs etc.

@Elmach. Thanks very much.

But I also saw a shot where somebody was imputting orbit cords into areas, and in the next shot, he'd gone into an orbit around somewhere.

That is likely the dev debug menu. It's not in the released version.
